snippet: A competition called “bull butting” by some in the United Arab Emirates has entertained crowds and given bragging rights to bull owners for as long as people there can remember.
abstract: Al Fujayrah Journal; competition called 'bull butting,' in which bulls lock horns and try to push each other backward, has been entertaining crowds in United Arab Emirates city of Al Fujayrah and giving bragging rights to bull owners for as long as people can remember; contest is one reminder of distant past in rapidly developing country.
lead_paragraph: A competition called “bull butting” by some in the United Arab Emirates has entertained crowds and given bragging rights to bull owners for as long as people there can remember.

headline.seo: In the Crash of Bull Horns, Echoes of a Desert Land of Old
headline.main: In the Crash of Bull Horns, Echoes of a Desert Land of Old
headline.print_headline: In the Crash of Bull Horns, Echoes of a Desert Land of Old
